alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Orthodox science too often takes on an air of omniscience; that is, that all the basic knowledge we have is all there is. This position is further complicated by its companion attitude -- infallibility. Orthodox scientists often believe that there is only one way and we have never taken wrong or dead-end paths."

- R.A. Ford, Homemade Lightning
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Orthodox Scientists - Omniscient, Infallible, Always Forward
